mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_form t where t.id_ in
#{item}
order by t.order_,t.id_
select case when exists( SELECT * FROM ujcms_form WHERE org_id_ = #{orgId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists
select case when exists( SELECT * FROM ujcms_form WHERE user_id_ = #{userId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists
select case when exists( SELECT * FROM ujcms_form WHERE type_id_ = #{typeId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists

trim.if: t.org_id_ in #{id} or t.org_id_ in (select orgPerm.perm_org_id_ from ujcms_org_perm orgPerm where orgPerm.org_id_ in #{id})
or t.org_id_ in (select roleOrg.org_id_ from ujcms_role_org roleOrg where roleOrg.role_id_ in #{id})

mapper.update: update ujcms_form set type_id_ = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, org_id_ = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_id_ = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, process_instance_id_ = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_reason_ = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_ = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip_ = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, mains_json_ = #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_form (id_, type_id_, site_id_, org_id_, user_id_, modified_user_id_, process_instance_id_, reject_reason_, created_, modified_, ip_, order_, status_, mains_json_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.type_id_, t.site_id_, t.org_id_, t.user_id_, t.modified_user_id_, t.process_instance_id_, t.reject_reason_, t.created_, t.modified_, t.ip_, t.order_, t.status_, t.mains_json_
